MAIN_MESSAGE: Following an unplanned power cut in the CH8 Penyffordd area of Holywell on 28th January, it will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:00pm today to complete repairs on the underground cable network. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:28pm on 2nd February 2021.
